name: swag
description: SWAG (Secure Web Application Gateway) is a Docker image that bundles Nginx, Letâ€™s Encrypt, and security defaults to provide a secure reverse proxy and SSL gateway for self-hosted services.

features.title: Reverse Proxy
features.description: Routes traffic to multiple backend services from single entry point

features.title: Let's Encrypt
features.description: Automatically obtains and renews SSL certificates

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Built on proven Nginx web server for reliability and performance

features.title: Pre
features.description: Includes security headers, rate limiting, and fail2ban integration

features.title: Subdomain Routing
features.description: Routes requests to different services based on subdomains

features.title: Authentication
features.description: Adds authentication layer to services with Authelia or basic auth

features.title: Duckdns Support
features.description: Integrates with DuckDNS for dynamic DNS updates

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Provides pre-made configs for popular self-hosted applications
